dimension: 16 x 1 1/2 x 1/2 in. (40.64 x 3.81 x 1.27 cm) (without ties)
title: Tie, from a church roadman's costume
description: two vertical flannel strips, edged in blue and white beads; one red strip with blue and yellow stripes at bottom, one blue strip with white, red and yellow stripes at bottom; horizontal loop at top creating necktie shape; red ties attached to leather thongs
